price: ߏ߬ ߞߐ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߓߐ߲ߛߐ߲ ߘߊ߲߫ ߓߐߢߐ߲߯ߘߐ ߘߐ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߓߐ߫ ߖߌߣߍ߲߫ ߝߛߐߞߐߙߌ ߘߐ߫
arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلَ نَسۡلَهُۥ مِن سُلَٰلَةٖ مِّن مَّآءٖ مَّهِينٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: thumma jaʿala naslahu min sulālatin min māin mahīnin
